clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of an Intervention Based on Cell Phones
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Effect of an Intervention Based on Cell Phones on Glycemic Control in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

lead_sponsor.agency: Instituto Nacional de Salud Publica, Mexico

clinical_study.source: Instituto Nacional de Salud Publica, Mexico

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study was to assess the effect of an individualized intervention based on cell phones to improve glycemic control in patients with type 2 diabetes attending Epidemiology Research Unit in Cuernavaca, Morelos. Mexico

detailed_description.textblock:
In this study before randomization, the participants received workshops on diet, physical activity, glycemic index of foods.
Bandura´s theoretical model was used in the voice messages sent to the intervention group.

primary_outcome.description: Glycated hemoglobin is obtained from a blood sample at the beginning of the study and 3 months later.

secondary_outcome.description: Low Density Lipoprotein is obtained from a blood sample at the beginning of the study and 3 months later.
High Density Lipoprotein is obtained from a blood sample at the beginning of the study and 3 months later.
Cholesterol is obtained from a blood sample at the beginning of the study and 3 months later.

Self-efficacy questionnaire is divided into a diet´s self-efficacy questionnaire and physical activity´s self-efficacy questionnaire. People can obtained "low self-efficacy" status or "high self-efficacy" status
A triaxial accelerometer was used, colocated on the hip and the participants were supposed to use it 7 days for a minimal of 10 hours per day

arm_group.description: This group receive voice messages to reinforce given information about diet, physical activity, glycemic index
This group received voice messages with fun facts.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- type 2 diabetes mellitus > 10 years
- Glycated hemoglobin >7%
Exclusion Criteria:
- Take insulin regularly
- Pregnant woman
- Woman who expected to be pregnant the next 6 months
- 24 hrs creatinine < 30 ml/minute
